messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] What does unschooling mean to you?...Share your opinion and WIN!!!
messages.msgSnippet: OH my gosh dandeliongirls, its me rebecca dehate from the rethinking education conference -- i checked out your sites and I am so envious.  I let Ian go back
messages.messageBody:
OH my gosh dandeliongirls, its me rebecca dehate from the rethinking education conference -- i checked out your sites and I am so envious.  I let Ian go back to school (i pulled him last year just like you did your girl even around the same time then we met at the conference and when we got back he kept exploding to go back so I let him....  however after a year in and recognizing I gave in to negative around me and everything that He will be home next year -- he wants to finish kindergarten.... 

--- On Thu, 3/12/09, dandeliongirls <dandeliongirls@...> wrote:
From: dandeliongirls <dandeliongirls@...>
Subject: [unschoolingbasics] What does unschooling mean to you?...Share your opinion and WIN!!!
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Date: Thursday, March 12, 2009, 11:45 AM














I'd like to invite you to share your opinion!



Just answer the question-



"What does unschooling mean to you?"



and you could win an adorable handmade magnet board, custom designed for you!



Enter here-

http://www.flickr. com/groups/ unskooled/ discuss/72157615 072545669/



or here-

http://dandeliongir ls.blogspot. com/2009/ 03/share- your-opinion- and-win.html



I can't wait to read everyone's responses!































[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
